game.name: Zoo Animal Transport Simulator
game.description:
Some crazy animals have entered an urban city and you have taken the responsibility of sending them to their home and rescuing the innocent citizens. Forget all the animal hunting games you tried out in the past and get ready to spend some quality time while transporting cute animals from one place to another in Zoo Animal Transport Simulator! There are possibilities of meeting with the angry cheetah on the way to the modern city. Get ready to hit him with a tranquilizer dart instead of killing it!

All the animals that you see in this urban city are missing their quality of natural life. Now your job is to transport them from the urban area to zoo or safari park to help them get back to their home in this brand new racing game. Start it by delivering 2 zebras to the Animal Zoo in just 1 minute or 60 seconds! Choose any mode out of three options including Practice, Time Travel and survival in this HTML5 truck game.

It is time to bring out yourself as a professional driver of truck driving games to help all the animals to reach to their destined places. You have to face off multiple tricky hurdles including barriers and other challenges when you move your vehicle from one place to another. Remember you have to complete your task before the time expires in each level so make sure to get your animals deliver fast to secure extra points. Good luck to have a blast in this cool wild animal transport game!
